channel.title: Test Interactions on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Test Interactions on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: Inbound Voice Testing
item.description: Test an Incoming Voice Interaction The first step in testing a voice interaction is ensuring you have the correct inbound voice number to dial. Navigate to the admin page and search for call routing. Find the call route that you set up earlier and save the phone number to your mobile device. Navigate to the Interactions pane on the left side of the screen and ensure you are set to “On-Queue” (found at top right of screen) Dial the DID number from a personal phone and select “answer” when the interaction comes through

item.title: Web Chat Testing
item.description: Test a Chat Interaction The first step in testing a chat interaction visiting our web chat developer tool at the Genesys Cloud CX Developer Center First you’ll need to login to your Genesys Cloud instance by clicking on your profile picture. Then navigate to the Deployment dropdown and ensure you have selected the “G-Ride” Deployment and ensure the ““Queue” field is set to “G-Ride.” You can then put in any customer data if you like and then press start chat.

item.title: SMS Testing
item.description: Test an SMS Interaction The first step in testing an SMS interaction is ensuring you have the correct number. Navigate to the admin page and search for “Message Routing.” Then find the message route that you created earlier and save the SMS number to your mobile device. Navigate to the Interactions pane on the left side of the screen and ensure you are set to “On-Queue” (found at top right of screen)

item.title: Email Testing
item.description: Test an Email Interaction The first step in testing an email interaction is ensuring you have the correct email address. Navigate to the admin page and search for “Email.” Then click into the domain you created and find the email address that you created earlier. All we need to do is send an email from our personal email to that email address! Go ahead and do that now.
